alert.note: Alert for Hot Springs (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 1:53PM MDT until June 25 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hot Springs County in central Wyoming... * Until 245 PM MDT. * At 152 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Hamilton Dome, which is also 15 miles west of Thermopolis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Thermopolis and Hot Springs State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
